title: All activities cancelled on Upper, Middle and Lower Campus at UCT Released: 11h00, 19 October ...
text: ( Source : University of Cape Town ) All activities cancelled on Upper, Middle and Lower Campus at UCT Released : 11h00, 19 October 2015 19 October 2015 Dear colleagues and students All lectures, academic and other operation on UPPER CAMPUS ,
